aboutGame.title: About the Game
aboutGame.subtitle1: A new fantasy role-playing action game
aboutGame.text1: Rise, Tarnished! The Lands Between awaits its Lord. May grace guide you to the Elden Ring.
aboutGame.text2: A vast world with open fields, numerous situations, and gigantic dungeons where complex 3D structures blend together. Travel, overcome deadly dangers, and rejoice in success.
aboutGame.text3: You can not only change your characterâ€™s appearance but also combine weapons, armor, and items. Develop your character to your liking. Build muscles or master magical arts.
aboutGame.subtitle4: An epic drama born from myth
aboutGame.text4: A multilayered story, fragmented into pieces. An epic drama where the thoughts of characters intersect in the Lands Between.
aboutGame.subtitle5: A unique online mode bringing you closer to other players
aboutGame.text5: In addition to the multiplayer mode where you directly connect with other players and travel together, there is an asynchronous online mode that lets you feel the presence of other players.
